hero.desc: At Unitas – we are redefining recruitment in finance – by delivering new ways compelling opportunities meet the industry’s top-tier talent.

lookingForAJob.desc: Transform your finance career with Unitas. Browse our exciting open roles, find opportunities that meet your aspirations, and apply online – or contact us for more helpful information.

home.desc: Elevate your financial team with exceptional talent. Find visionary minds in finance and critical industry experts to gain a competitive edge in today's rapidly evolving finance landscape.

cv.title: Be sent 3 CVs with no obligations
cv.text: Instantly discover talent by receiving three targeted CVs via our proprietary candidate sourcing tech – commitment-free.

lookingToHire.desc: Build your team through our strategic permanent hiring solutions. Elevate the workforce with skilled professionals for lasting growth and sustained success.

cv.title: Be sent 3 CVs with no obligations
cv.text: Instantly discover talent by receiving three targeted CVs via our proprietary candidate sourcing tech – commitment-free.

specialisms.title: Specialisms
specialisms.desc: Our expansive team of experts covers a diverse array of fields, enabling us to provide comprehensive solutions across various specialisms.

sectors.title: Sectors
sectors.desc: Our company's versatility spans across numerous sectors, allowing us to customise solutions for distinct challenges and niche opportunities.

contract.desc: Optimise project delivery with our agile contract hiring. Our skilled professionals seamlessly integrate into your work-streams, guaranteeing results.

executiveSearch.desc: Our comprehensive and highly-successful approach to executive recruitment encompasses four key stages – client research and needs assessment, executive identification and outreach, assessment and evaluation, and offer management and onboarding.

1.title: Research & needs assessment
1.text: By consulting clients, creating detailed role specifications, and analysing markets, we grasp your needs and conditions, enabling a precise recruitment strategy.

2.title: Executive identification & outreach
2.text: Through a blend of diverse sourcing, discreet outreach, and meticulous long-listing, we connect with candidates meeting criteria and expressing genuine interest.

3.title: Assessment & evaluation
3.text: Thorough interviews, reference validation, and assessments such as psychometric tests ensure the selection qualified, compatible candidates, enhancing your recruitment process.

4.title: Offer management & onboarding
4.text: We curate a refined shortlist based on our evaluations, expertly manage offers and negotiations while you conduct interviews, and assist seamless new role transitions.

embeddedTalent.desc: Our embedded talent solutions cover onboarding, resource management, performance monitoring, and transitions. From seamless integration to skill management, performance alignment, and smooth exits, our approach ensures a highly-successful collaborative journey.

1.title: Onboarding & integration
1.text: We can guarantee seamless assimilation of external talent. Through processes, tools, training, and alignment with your culture and objectives, we ensure their swift integration.

2.title: Resource & skill management
2.text: We perform skill assessments, targeted talent acquisition, gap analysis, talent pools, and ongoing learning to ensure your projects access the right expertise for success.

3.title: Performance monitoring & feedback
3.text: We ensure external talent's alignment with your company goals, with use of metrics, check-ins, feedback, KPIs, and reviews for effective collaboration and measurable success.

4.title: Transition & off-boarding
4.text: We promise to provide smooth talent exits, role shifts, knowledge transfers, structured protocols, feedback, evaluations, and potential future engagements, optimising collaboration value.

workForUs.desc: Discover more about our innovative company and game-changing service to further ignite your enthusiasm for Unitas.

container.title: Want to work for us?
container.text: If you're enthusiastic about joining our incredibly talented team, be sure to monitor the open roles at Unitas.

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.desc: Our distinguished leadership team comprises of three seasoned industry experts, each bringing a wealth of experience and boasting a proven track record of driving innovation and success.

specialists.desc: Our specialists comprise of a diverse group of experts, all of which experienced in a broad array of industry sectors and specialisms, ensuring both our clients and candidates receive an unprecedented level of service.

ourStory.desc: Our company is the culmination of our three founders' extensive career journeys. In establishing Unitas, they have formed a powerhouse committed to the innovation of recruitment in finance.

info.title: The mission statement...
info.text: Our mission is to revolutionise the recruitment landscape by delivering exceptional results through innovative practices. We are dedicated to exceeding client expectations by leveraging cutting-edge approaches that consistently source, assess, and match top-tier talent. Through our unwavering commitment to excellence and continuous innovation, we strive to transform businesses and careers, driving success and shaping the future of recruitment.

ourProcess.desc: Talent acquisition is being redefined thanks to our cutting-edge, in-house proprietary artificial intelligence technology, which streamlines the end-to-end process to deliver the most qualified candidates efficiently and with unprecedented precision.

1.title: Simultaneous talent pool targeting
1.text: We run concurrent searches on internal and external sources e.g. pro networks and job boards.

2.title: Extensive data analysis
2.text: We accurately examine suitable candidates with unparalleled position specificity.

3.title: Automated candidate sourcing
3.text: We intelligently identify and effectively engage with highly-qualified individuals.

executiveSearch.desc: Talent acquisition is being redefined thanks to our cutting-edge, in-house proprietary artificial intelligence technology, which streamlines the end-to-end process to deliver the most qualified executive candidates efficiently and with unprecedented precision.

ourStory.title: Values that make us who we are
ourStory.desc: We abide by five core company values which serve as the compass that directs our actions, shapes our culture, and fuels our commitment to excellence.

1.title: Integrity
1.text: Upholding the highest ethical standards in every interaction and decision.

2.title: Transparency
2.text: Fostering open communication and trust, ensuring clarity in all engagements.

3.title: Honesty
3.text: Embracing truthfulness and sincerity, building authentic relationships with clients and candidates.

4.title: Efficiency
4.text: Streamlining processes and delivering prompt, effective solutions to meet client needs.

5.title: Excellence
5.text: Demonstrating meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to achieving remarkable results for clients and candidates alike.

ourProcess.title: Why it’s great for clients
ourProcess.desc: Our AI technology provides us, and our clients, a plethora of advantages, such as expanded candidate talent pools, higher candidate quality, unbiased selection, reduced time-to-fill, and cost savings for hiring companies.

1.title: Larger candidate talent pools
1.text: Expanding candidate talent pools to ensure a comprehensive and diverse sourcing approach.

2.title: Higher quality of candidates & key info
2.text: Elevating candidate quality by accessing key information for more informed and effective decision-making.

3.title: No bias, complying with inclusion policies
3.text: Ensuring an unbiased and equitable selection process, in strict compliance with inclusion policies.

4.title: Overall time-to-fill is reduced
4.text: Significantly reducing the overall time-to-fill vacancies, streamlining the recruitment journey.

5.title: Cost savings are passed to hiring companies
5.text: Passing on cost savings directly to hiring companies, optimising resource allocation and maximising value.

executiveSearch.title: Why Executive Search is great for clients
executiveSearch.desc: Our process encompasses comprehensive research, diverse candidate sourcing, thorough evaluation, and streamlined offer management and onboarding, ensuring a seamless transition into new roles for top-tier executive talent.

1.title: Research & needs assessment
1.text: By consulting clients, creating detailed role specifications, and analysing markets, we grasp your needs and conditions, enabling a precise recruitment strategy.

2.title: Executive identification & outreach
2.text: Through a blend of diverse sourcing, discreet outreach, and meticulous long-listing, we connect with candidates meeting criteria and expressing genuine interest.

3.title: Assessment & evaluation
3.text: Thorough interviews, reference validation, and assessments such as psychometric tests ensure the selection qualified, compatible candidates, enhancing your recruitment process.

4.title: Offer management & onboarding
4.text: We curate a refined shortlist based on our evaluations, expertly manage offers and negotiations while you conduct interviews, and assist seamless new role transitions.

contractInterim.title: Why our contract service is great for clients
contractInterim.desc: Our streamlined contract service encompasses effective client engagement, candidate sourcing and shortlisting, interview coordination, seamless onboarding, performance monitoring, and contract management for a comprehensive and smooth transition.

1.title: Client engagement & requirement understanding
1.text: We initiate communication, gather comprehensive job specifications, and establish clear contract terms to lay the groundwork for a successful partnership.

2.title: Candidate sourcing & shortlisting
2.text: Our candidate sourcing and shortlisting strategy involves diverse channels, thorough screening, and meticulous evaluation, resulting in a refined shortlist of the most fitting candidates for the next selection stage.

3.title: Interview & selection process
3.text: We manage interview coordination, gather feedback for refinement, and facilitate offer negotiation to ensure a seamless transition for the chosen candidate.

4.title: Onboarding & contract management
4.text: We finalise contracts, guide seamless candidate onboarding, monitor performance, and discuss contract renewal or conclusion for a smooth transition.

embeddedTalent.title: Why embedding Unitas is great for clients
embeddedTalent.desc: Our services ensure seamless assimilation of external talent, expert resource management, performance alignment through metrics and feedback, and smooth transitions for optimised collaboration.

1.text: We can guarantee seamless assimilation of external talent. Through processes, tools, training, and alignment with your culture and objectives, we ensure their swift integration.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: The policy sets out the different areas where user privacy is concerned and outlines the obligations & requirements of the users, the website and website owners. Furthermore the way this website processes, stores and protects user data and information will also be detailed within this policy.

part1.title: The Website
part1.text: This website and its owners take a proactive approach to user privacy and ensure the necessary steps are taken to protect the privacy of its users throughout their visiting experience. This website complies to all UK national laws and requirements for user privacy.

part2.title: Cookie Policy
part2.text: This website uses cookies to better the users experience while visiting the website. Where applicable this website uses a cookie control system allowing the user on their first visit to the website to allow or disallow the use of cookies on their computer / device. This complies with recent legislation requirements for websites to obtain explicit consent from users before leaving behind or reading files such as cookies on a user’s computer / device.
part2.text2: The cookies in use to deliver Google Analytics service are used to store information, such as what time your current visit occurred, whether you have been to the site before, and what site referred you to the web page. These cookies contain no personally identifiable information but they will use your computer’s IP address to know from where in the world you are accessing the Internet. Google stores the information collected by these cookies on servers in the United States. Google may transfer this information to third-parties were required to do so by law, or where such third-parties process the information on Google’s behalf.

part3.title: Opt-out
part3.text: In order to provide website visitors with more choice on how data is collected by Google Analytics, Google has developed the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on. The add-on communicates with the Google Analytics JavaScript (ga.js) to stop data being sent to Google Analytics. The Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on does not affect usage of the website in any other way. A link to further information on the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on is provided below for your convenience.

part4.text: For more information on the usage of cookies by Google Analytics please see the Google website. A link to the privacy advice for this product is provided below for your convenience.

part5.title: Disabling Cookies
part5.text: If you would like to restrict the use of cookies you can control this in your Internet browser. Links to advice on how to do this for the most popular Internet browsers are provided below for convenience and will be available for the Internet browser of your choice either online or via the software help(normally available via key F1).

part7.title: Contact & Communication
part7.text: Users contacting this website and/or its owners do so at their own discretion and provide any such personal details requested at their own risk. Your Personal information is kept private and stored securely until a time it is no longer required or has no use, as detailed in the Data Protection Act 1998. Every effort has been made to ensure a safe and secure form to email submission process but advise users using such form to email processes that they do so at their own risk.
part7.text2: This website and its owners use any information submitted to provide you with further information about the products / services they offer or to assist you in answering any questions or queries you may have submitted. This includes using your details to subscribe you to any email newsletter program the website operates but only if this was made clear to you and your express permission was granted when submitting any form to email process. Or whereby you the consumer have previously purchased from or enquired about purchasing from the company a product or service that the email newsletter relates to. This is by no means an entire list of your user rights in regard to receiving email marketing material. Your details are not passed on to any third parties.

part8.title: Email Newsletter
part8.text: This website operates an email newsletter program, used to inform subscribers about products and services supplied by this website. Users can subscribe through an online automated process should they wish to do so but do so at their own discretion. Some subscriptions may be manually processed through prior written agreement with the user.
part8.text2: Subscriptions are taken in compliance with UK Spam Laws detailed in the Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations 2003. All personal details relating to subscriptions are held securely and in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998. No personal details are passed on to third parties nor shared with companies / people outside of the company that operates this website. Under the Data Protection Act 1998 you may request a copy of personal information held about you by this website’s email newsletter program. A small fee will be payable. If you would like a copy of the information held on you please write to the business address at the bottom of this policy.
part8.text3: Email marketing campaigns published by this website or its owners may contain tracking facilities within the actual email. Subscriber activity is tracked and stored in a database for future analysis and evaluation. Such tracked activity may include; the opening of emails, forwarding of emails, the clicking of links within the email content, times, dates and frequency of activity [this is by no means a comprehensive list].
part8.text4: This information is used to refine future email campaigns and supply the user with more relevant content based around their activity. In compliance with UK Spam Laws and the Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations 2003 subscribers are given the opportunity to unsubscribe at any time through an automated system. This process is detailed at the footer of each email campaign. If an automated un-subscription system is unavailable clear instructions on how to un-subscribe will by detailed instead.

part9.title: External Links
part9.text: Although this website only looks to include quality, safe and relevant external links, users are advised adopt a policy of caution before clicking any external web links mentioned throughout this website. The owners of this website cannot guarantee or verify the contents of any externally linked website despite their best efforts. Users should therefore note they click on external links at their own risk and this website and its owners cannot be held liable for any damages or implications caused by visiting any external links mentioned.

part10.title: Social Media Platforms
part10.text: Communication, engagement and actions taken through external social media platforms that this website and its owners participate on are custom to the terms and conditions as well as the privacy policies held with each social media platform respectively.
part10.text2: Users are advised to use social media platforms wisely and communicate / engage upon them with due care and caution in regard to their own privacy and personal details. This website nor its owners will ever ask for personal or sensitive information through social media platforms and encourage users wishing to discuss sensitive details to contact them through primary communication channels such as by telephone or email.
part10.text3: This website may use social sharing buttons which help share web content directly from web pages to the social media platform in question. Users are advised before using such social sharing buttons that they do so at their own discretion and note that the social media platform may track and save your request to share a web page respectively through your social media platform account.

part11.title: Shortened Links in Social Media
part11.text: This website and its owners through their social media platform accounts may share web links to relevant web pages. By default some social media platforms shorten lengthy urls [web addresses] (this is an example:http://bit.ly/zyVUBo). Users are advised to take caution and good judgement before clicking any shortened urls published on social media platforms by this website and its owners. Despite the best efforts to ensure only genuine urls are published many social media platforms are prone to spam and hacking and therefore this website and its owners cannot be held liable for any damages or implications caused by visiting any shortened links.

part12.title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
part12.text: You can contact our Data Protection Officer on (hello@unitastalent.com).
part12.text2: Everyone here at www.unitastalent.com is familiar with the GDPR legislation,and exactly what their personal responsibilities are. Anyone joining the company is trained internally on induction day, and then at regular intervals of 2 years afterwards. If there is a change in legislation, then we ensure that everyone is fully up-to-date on the latest points.
part12.text3: You do have the right to be forgotten, and no longer receive any communication from us. You can do this via our contact form.
part12.text4: You can rest assured that absolutely no personal data is transferred outside of the EU under any circumstances (unless prior written consent is given by the person who’s data is to be transferred).
part12.text5:
When processing any data we abide by the following points:

– The processing of any data is lawful, fair and we are fully transparent about what the data is being used for
– We only collect data that is necessary for normal business operation
– All data is kept accurate and up-to-date
– Data is not kept for any longer than is reasonably necessary
– All data is kept safe and secure at all times If you have enquired about our services, then we have a legitimate interest in contacting you again to follow up on your enquiry.
part12.text6: If at this point you no longer wish to hear from us then we would welcome it if you could inform us of this, and we will no longer contact you and remove your data. As outlined above, all data is held securely, but in the unlikely event of a security breach, we do have a notification process in place.
part12.text7: If you would like to find out what data we hold about you, please use our contact form with a subject of DSAR Request.
part12.text8: This policy may be updated from time to time, so please ensure you check it regularly.

thePrimeGroup.subText: Proudly part of The Prime Group
